title: New KCC upgrades plants to raise processing capacity
content: Standard Business   Business / Standard Business  57 minutes ago  1 Views  comments    State-owned New KCC aims to regain its position as the top milk processing company in Kenya as it upgrades its equipment at a cost of Sh1 billion.
